english.title: Possess a television set with intent to install / use without a licence
english.legislation: Contrary to section 363(3)(a) and (4) of the    Communications Act 2003.
english.pointstoprove:
date and location
possess/control
a colour/black and white TV set
with intent to install/use it
without a licence

investigatoraction.description: Confirm proposed charge is appropriately authorised (Police or CPS)
Ensure compliance with investigator's obligations re disclosure
Consider if case suitable for referral to Financial Investigation Unit and CPS for asset recovery eg confiscation order
Guilty Plea by letter procedure may be offered for this offence
